# Welcome to My Portfolio

This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).

## About This Course
Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.

## About Me
Hi! My name is **Yanyang Chen**.  I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Urban Spatial Analytics at the University of Pennsylvania.  
I have a background in Urban and Rural Planning from Jilin University Zhuhai College, with experience in urban design, spatial analysis, and architecture.  
I am passionate about applying data-driven methods to solve urban problems and to promote sustainable and resilient city development.
